name: Fight High
description:
Fend off an infinite horde of enemies, the longer you survive the tougher it becomes.
Test your endurance and see how far you can go!

Fight above the clouds on the magnificent floating islands.

Purchase weapons and abilities to help the fight. Be sure to upgrade those weapons and unleash full chaos as they're maxed out.
To help with the hordes of endless chaos, be sure to make use of the health pick ups scattered around as well.

Be wise about where you decide to hunker down - make use of the surrounding turrets.

Features


Characters


Each character has its own unique passive ability, be smart about your choice.

Passives
  • Zerker : Has 50% More HP
  • Heavy : Damage resistance - the lower HP, the more resistant.
  • Pyro : Passive HP regeneration - the Lower the HP the more it heals.
  • Scout : Speed - The lower HP the faster your movement speed.
  • Sniper : Lifesteal - you get 50% HP back from damage dealt.
  • Assault : Damage Buff - The lower the HP, the harder you hit.

Each character starts with its respective weapon as well.

Abilities

There are 6 unique abilities as well.

  • Drone - Summons a healing drone.
  • Nova - Activates a bullet nova around you.
  • Turret - Activates across the map to help you fight.
  • Damage - Buffs your damage.
  • Speed - Increases your movement speed.
  • Tank - Gives you damage resistance.
